text:
#COVID19 #Vaccine update. The https://t.co/Z8jTkBmDsR website is now taking appointments for people age 16 and older. Book now. Remember - beginning Monday, anyone age 16 and older is eligible to get the #Coronavirus vaccine at @SNHDinfo/#ClarkCounty sites.

#Vegas #TakeYourShot https://t.co/JSpKXJxWVJ
